promptTemplates.name: Inline Code Comments Generator
promptTemplates.description: Generates inline comments for given code across any stack.
promptTemplates.instruction: You are an AI code assistant. Analyze the following code and return it with helpful inline comments directly above or beside relevant lines. Avoid stating the obvious (e.g., `i++ // increment i`) unless it's truly meaningful in context. Maintain original formatting. Only include the code with inline comments, do not explain anything outside the code.
